p: Several therapeutic strategies can reverse NAFLD [ 14], but the most important approach is lifestyle modification with diet and exercise [ 15, 16]. A body weight reduction of 7–10% obtained with energy restriction and increased physical activity leads to histological improvement of steatosis, inflammation, and fibrosis [ 17, 18]. Pharmaceutical approaches, in turn, focus directly on hepatic fat accumulation, anti–inflammatory effects (e.g., oxidative stress alleviation and modulation of tumor necrosis factor), insulin sensitization, or anti–obesity drugs [ 14]. Thus far, however, these approaches have shown rather limited effects on the progression of fatty liver [ 16, 19, 20].
